ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing.export

Class Graphics2DRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Graphics
      • java.awt.Graphics2D
        • ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing.export.Graphics2DRecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Graphics2DRecorder
extends java.awt.Graphics2D
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A class that can be substituted for a Graphics2D object, but instead of performing any actual drawing, it simply records the drawing instructions. These instructions can later be replayed onto a "real" Graphics2D object or converted into vector graphics by an appropriate converter.

        Specified by:
        draw in class java.awt.Graphics2D

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Shape s,
                 boolean createCopy)
        The the outline of the specified Shape.
        Parameters:
        s - The shape to draw.
        createCopy - If true, a copy of the shape will be made so that if it changes after the call, the recorded operation will still use the copy of the shape at the time of the call to draw(). This should be set to true, unless it is known that the shape will never be changed (i.e. if it is created internally) or if any changes are intentionally meant to affect later application of the recorded operation.

      • fill

        public void fill(java.awt.Shape s,
                 boolean createCopy)
        Fill the specified Shape.
        Parameters:
        s - The shape to fill.
        createCopy - If true, a copy of the shape will be made so that if it changes after the call, the recorded operation will still use the copy of the shape at the time of the call to fill(). This should be set to true, unless it is known that the shape will never be changed (i.e. if it is created internally) or if any changes are intentionally meant to affect later application of the recorded operation.

      • getXORMode

        @NotNull
public java.awt.Color getXORMode()
